about_the_game:
This pack contains 3 starter packs for Shades Of Rayna: Starter Pets Pack, Starter Adventure Pass and Starter Character Effects Pack.

Starter Pets Pack

This pack contains 5 pets:

Jojo - Passively boosts gold drops.
Ermea - Passively boosts fire rate / attack speed.
Karam - Passively boosts damage.
Gernondu - Collects loot in radius.
Numuo - Passively boosts movement speed.

All 5 of them are passive pets and tier 1. You can upgrade all pets' tiers in game. You can't upgrade a tier of a pet if you don't own the pet.

Starter Adventure Pass

This dlc contains adventure passes of 4 Npcs:

- Researcher
- Collector
- Trader
- Bounty Hunter

Adventure passes give rewards such as materials, upgrade stones, npc tokens, npc attribute boosts (spawn possibility, extra reward, discount, pass experience, maximum quests have) at every adventure pass level.

Starter Character Effects Pack

This dlc contains 5 character effects with trails:

- Fire
- Shield
- Freeze
- Crystal
- Pulse

You can use these effects from the beginning of the game and change whenever you want on the main menu.
